titleStmt.title: Act of the Committee of Estates for bringing up of deficients and runawayes, and quartering of them, and for ane [sic] account from the shires of their diligence in execution of former publike Acts. April 23. 1645.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament. Committee of Estates.
Primrose, Archibald, Sir, 1616-1679.

notesStmt.note: An act enforcing penalties against deserters from the Army in Scotland during the Civil War, 1642-1649.
Imperfect: foot of sheet cropped with loss of imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
